nodes.text: Jedi Academy: Trilogy Box Set is a compilation box-set featuring the first three junior novels in the Star Wars: Jedi Academy series: Jedi Academy, Jedi Academy: Return of the Padawan, and Jedi Academy: The Phantom Bully.

This set includes all three books from the NY TIMES BESTSELLING SERIES Star Wars: Jedi Academy. Created by award-winning author/illustrator Jeffrey Brown, this series is a hit for readers of all ages. Whether you're familiar with Star Wars or if you're new to the galaxy, this heartfelt and hilarious adventure follows middle grader Roan as he navigates being a Jedi and dealing with bullies, aliens, robots, and even school dances.
